verses.padam: Apaḥ|undantu|jIvasE̱|dIrGAyutvAyEti̍# dIrGAyu - tvAya|varca̍sE|Oṣa̍dhE|trAya̍sva|Enam|svadhi̍ta̍ iti sva-dhitE|mA|Enam|hiṃqsIḥ|dEvaśrUriti# dEva - śrUḥ|EtAni|prEti̍|vapE|svasti|utta̍rAṇItyut̍ - tarAṇi|aśIya|Apaḥ|asmAn|mAtara̍ḥ|śundhantu|GRutEna̍|naḥ|GRutapuva̍ iti# GRuta-puvaḥ|punantu|viśva̱m|asmat|prEti̍|vahantu|ripram|uditi̍|AByaḥ|śuci̍ḥ|Eti̍|pUtaḥ|Emi|sOma̍sya|tanUḥ|asi|tanuva̱m|mE|pAhi|mahInAm|paya̍ḥ|asi|varcOdhA̍ iti varcaḥ - dhAḥ|asi|varcaḥ|1̍ (50)
verses.samhita: Apa# undantu jIvasE# dIrGAyutvAya varcasa̍ OṣadhE̍ trAyasvainaṅq̍ svadhitE̍ mainaṃ# hiṃsIr dEvaśrUrEtAni pra vapE̍ svastyuttarAṇyaśIyApO̍# asmAn mAtaraḥ̍ śundhantu GRutEna# nO GRutapuvaḥ̍ punantu viśvamasmat̍ pra vahantu̍ ripramudA̱Byaḥ śucirA pUta Emi̍ sOmasya̍ tanUrasi̍ tanuvaM̍ mE pAhi mahInAM payO&si̍ varcOdhA asi̍ varcO - [ ] 1

verses.padam: mayi|dhEhi|vRutrasya̍|kanIni̍kA|asi|cakṣuṣpA̍ iti# cakṣuḥ - pAḥ|asi|cakṣuḥ|mE|pAhi|citpatiriti̍# cit - patiḥ|tvA|punAtu|vAkpatiriti̍# vAk - patiḥ|tvA|punAtu|dEvaḥ|tvA|savitA|punAtu|acCi̍drEṇa|pavitrE̍ṇa|vasO̱ḥ|sUrya̍sya|raśmiBiriti̍# raśmi - Biḥ|tasya|tE|pavitrapata̍ iti# pavitra -patE|pavitrEṇa|yasmai̱|kam|punE|tat|śakEyam|Eti̍|vaḥ|dEvAsaḥ|ImahE|satya̍dharmAṇa̍ iti satya# - dharmAṇaḥ|addhvarE|yat|vaḥ|dEvAsaḥ|Agura ityA̱ - gurE|yajñiyAsaḥ|havA̍mahE|indrA̱gnI̍ itIndra# - agnI|dyAvA# pRuthivI iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|Apaḥ|OṣadhIḥ̍ ( )|tvam|dIkṣAṇA̱m|adhipatirityadhi̍# - patiḥ|asi|iha|mA|santa̱m|pAhi||2 (58)
verses.samhita: mayi# dhEhi vRutrasya# kanInikA&si̍ cakṣuṣpA asi̍ cakṣurmE̍ pAhi citpatistvA̍ punAtu vAkpatistvA̍ punAtu dEvastvA# savitA punAtvacCi̍drEṇa̍ pavitrEṇa̍ vasOḥ sUryasya̍ raśmiBistasya# tE pavitrapatE pavitrEṇa̍ yasmai kaM punE tacCakEyamA̍ vO# dEvAsa ImahE satyadharmAṇO̍ addhvarE yadvO# dEvAsa AgurE yajñiyAsO̍ havAmaha̍ indrA̱gnI dyAvApRuthivI̍ Apa# OṣadhI ( ) stvaM dIkṣAṇA-madhipatirasIha̍ mA santaM̍ pAhi||2

verses.padam: AkU̱tyA ityA - kUtyai|prayuja iti# pra - yujE̱|agnayE̱|svAhA̱|mEdhAyai̱|manasE|agnayE̱|svAhA̱|dIkṣAyai̱|tapa̍sE|agnayE̱|svAhA̱|sara̍svatyai|pUṣṇE|agnayE̱|svAhA̱|Apa̍ḥ|dEvIḥ|bRuhatIḥ|viśvaśaMBuva̍ iti# viśva - śaMBuvaḥ|dyAvApRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|uru|antarikṣam|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|naḥ|haviṣA̱|vRudhAtu|svAhA̱|viśvE̱|dEvasya̍|nEtuḥ|marta̍ḥ|vRuṇIta|saKyam|viśvE̱|rAyaḥ|iṣuddhyasi|dyumnam|vRuṇIta|puṣyasE̱|svAhA̱|RuKsAmayOrityRu̍k̍ -sAmayO̱ḥ|śilpE iti|sthaḥ|tE̍ iti|vAm|Eti̍|raBE|tE̍ iti|mA|3̍ (50)
verses.samhita: AkU̱tyai prayujE&gnayE svAhA# mEdhAyai manasE̍ &gnayE svAhA# dIkṣAyai tapasE&gnayE̍ svAhA sarasvatyai̍ pUṣṇE̱&gnayE svAhA&&pO# dEvIr bRuhatIr viśvaśaMBuvO dyAvApRuthivI̍ urvantari̍kṣaM̍ bRuhaspatirnO̍ haviṣA# vRudhAtu svAhA viśvE# dEvasya# nEturmartO# vRuṇIta saKyaM ~MviśvE# rAya iṣuddhyasi̍ dyumnaM ~MvRuṇIta̍ puṣyasE svAhaṛKsAmayOḥ̍ śilpE̱ sthastE vAmA raBE̍ tE mA-[̍ ] 3

verses.padam: pAtam|Eti|asya|yajñasya̍|udRuca̍ ityut̍ - Rucaḥ|imAm|dhiya̱m|śikṣa̍mAṇasya|dEva|kratu̱m|dakṣa̱m|varuṇa|samiti̍|śiśAdhi|yayA̱|atIti̍|viśvA̱|duritEti̍# duḥ - itA|tarEma|sutarmA̍ṇamiti̍# su -tarmAṇam|adhIti̍|nAva̱m|ruhEma|Urk|asi|A~ggirasI|Urṇa̍mradA̍ ityUrṇa# - mradAḥ|Urja̱m|mE|yacCa|pAhi|mA|mA|mA|hiṃqsIḥ|viṣṇO̱ḥ|śarma|asi|śarma̍|yaja̍mAnasya|śarma̍|mE|yacCa|nakṣa̍trAṇAm|mA|atIkAśAt|pAhi|indra̍sya|yOni̍ḥ|asi|4̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pAtamAsya yajñasyOdRuca# imAM dhiyaṃq śikṣamAṇasya̍ dEva kratuM dakṣaM̍ ~Mvaruṇa saṃ śiśAdhi̍ yayA&ti viśvA# duritA tarEma̍ sutarmAṇamadhi̍ nAvaṃ# ruhEmOrgasyA~ggirasyUrṇa̍mradA̍ UrjaM̍ mE yacCa pAhi mA mA mA# hiṃsIr viṣṇOḥ śarmAsi̍ śarma yajamAnasya̍ śarma# mE yacCa nakṣatrAṇAM̍ mA&tIkAśAt pAhIndrasya̍ yOnirasi̍ - [ ] 4

verses.padam: mA|mA|hiṃqsIḥ|kRuṣyai|tvA|susasyAyA iti# su - sasyAyai̱|supippalABya iti# su - pippalAByaḥ|tvA|Oṣa̍dhIBya̍ ityOṣadhi̍ - Byaḥ|sUpasthA iti# su - upasthAḥ|dEvaḥ|vanaspatiḥ|Urddhvaḥ|mA|pAhi|Eti̍|udRuca̍ ityut̍ - Rucaḥ|svAhA̱|yajñam|mana̍sA|svAhA̱|dyAvA̍pRuthivIByAmiti̍ dyAvA̱ - pRuthivIByA̱m|svAhA̱|urOḥ|antarikṣAt|svAhA̱|yajñam|vAtA̱t|Eti̍|raBE||5̍ (30) ( mA - yOnirasi̍ - triṃqśacca# ) (A2)
verses.samhita: mA mA# hiṃsIḥ kRuṣyai tvA# susasyAyai# supippalABya-stvauṣadhIByaḥ̍ sUpasthA dEvO vanaspatirUrddhvO̍ mA# pAhyOdRucaḥ svAhA# yajñaM manasA̍ svAhA dyAvApRuthivIByAṅq̍ svAhOrO- rantarikṣAth̍ svAhA# yajñaM ~MvAtAdA raBE||5̍

verses.padam: daivI̱m|dhiya̱m|manAmahE|sumRuḍIkAmiti# su - mRuḍIkAm|aBiṣṭayE|varcOdhAmiti̍# varcaḥ - dhAm|yajñavAhasamiti̍# yajña - vAhasam|supArEti# su - pArA|naḥ|asat|vaśE̱||yE|dEvAḥ|manOjAtA̍ iti manaḥ̍ - jAtAḥ|manOyuja iti# manaḥ - yujaḥ|sudakṣA̍ iti# su - dakṣA̱ḥ|dakṣapitAra̍ iti dakṣa-̍ pitAraḥ|tE|naḥ|pAntu|tE|naḥ|avantu|tEbhyaḥ|nama̍ḥ|tEbhya̍ḥ|svAhA̱|agnE̱|tvam|sviti̍|jAgRuhi|vayam|sviti̍|mandiṣImahi|gOpAya|naḥ|svastayE̱|prabudha̍ iti# pra - budhE̱|naḥ|punaḥ|dadaḥ||tvam|agnE|vratapA̍ iti# vrata - pAḥ|asi|dEvaḥ|Eti|martyE̍ṣu|A||tvam|6̍ (50)
verses.samhita: daivIM dhiyaM̍ manAmahE sumRuḍIkA-maBiṣṭayE̍ varcOdhAM ~MyajñavAhasaṃ̍ supArA nO# asad vaśE̱|yE dEvA manOjAtA̍ manOyujaḥ̍ sudakṣA dakṣapitArastE̍ naḥ̍ pAntu tE nO&vantu̍ tEByO namastEByaḥ svAhA&gnE tvaṃ su jAgRuhi̍ vayaṃ su mandiṣImahi̍ gOpAya naḥ̍ svastayE̱ prabudhE# naḥ punardadaḥ|tvama̍gnE̍ vratapA asi̍ dEva A martyEṣvA|tvaM - [ ] 6

verses.padam: yajñEṣu|Iḍ^ya̍ḥ||viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|aBIti̍|mAm|Eti̍|avavRutrann|pUṣA|sanyA|sOma̍ḥ|rAdha̍sA|dEvaḥ|savitA|vasO̱ḥ|vasudAvEti̍# vasu - dAvA̱|rAsva|iya̍t|sOma|Eti̍|BUya̍ḥ|Bara|mA|pRuṇann|pUrtyA|vIti̍|rAdhi|mA|aham|Ayu̍ṣA|candram|asi|mama̍|BOgA̍ya|Bava|vastra̱m|asi|mama̍|BOgA̍ya|Bava|usrA|asi|mama̍|BOgA̍ya|Bava|haya̍ḥ|asi|mama̍|BOgA̍ya|Bava|7̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ~MyajñEṣvIḍyaḥ||viśvE̍# dEvA aBi mAmA&vavRutran̍ pUṣA sanyA sOmO rAdhasA̍ dEvaḥ savitA̍ vasO̱rvasudAvA rAsvEyath̍ sOmA &&*BUyO# Bara mA pRuṇan pUrtyA vi rAdhi̍ mA&hamAyuṣA̍ candramasi̍ mama BOgAya̍ Bava vastramasi̍ mama BOgAya̍ BavOsrA&si mama BOgAya̍ Bava hayO&si̍ mama BOgAya̍ Bava - [ ] 7

verses.padam: CAgaḥ|asi|mama̍|BOgA̍ya|Bava|mEṣaḥ|asi|mama̍|BOgA̍ya|Bava|vAyavE̱|tvA|varu̍ṇAya|tvA|niṛRu̍tyA̍ iti niḥ - Rutyai|tvA|rudrAya|tvA|dEvI̱ḥ|Apaḥ|apAm|napAt|yaḥ|Urmiḥ|haviṣya̍ḥ|indriyAvAnitI̱ndriya̍ - vAn|madintamaḥ|tam|vaḥ|mA|avEti̍|kramiṣam|acCi̍nnam|tantu̱m|pRuthivyAḥ|anviti̍|gEṣam|BadrAt|aBIti̍|śrEya̍ḥ|prEti̍|ihi|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|pura̍ EtEti# puraḥ - EtA|tE|astu|atha|Im|avEti̍|sya̍ ( )|varE̱|Eti|pRuthivyAḥ|ArE|śatrUn̍|kRuṇuhi|sarva̍vIra̍ iti sarva# - vIraḥ|Eti|idam|aganma|dEvayaja̍namiti̍# dEva - yajanam|pRuthivyAḥ|viśvE̱|dEvAḥ|yat|aju̍ṣanta|pUrvE̱|RuKsAmAByAmityRu̍KsAma̍ -ByAm|yajuṣA|saMtara̍nta̍ iti# saM - tarantaḥ|rAyaḥ|pOṣE̍ṇa|samiti̍|iṣA|madEma||8̍ (75) (A tvam - hayOsi̍ mama BOgAya̍ Bava sya pa~jcaviṃ̍ śatiśca ) (A3)
verses.samhita: CAgO&si̍ mama BOgAya̍ Bava mEṣO&si̍ mama BOgAya̍ Bava vAyavE̱ tvA varuṇAya̍ tvA niṛRutyai̍ tvA rudrAya# tvA dEvIrApO̍ apAM napAdya Urmiṛ haviṣya̍# indriyAvA̱n madintamastaM̍ ~MvO mA&va# kramiṣamacCinnaM̍ tantuM̍ pRuthivyA anu# gEṣaM BadrAdaBi śrEyaḥ prEhi bRuhaspatiḥ̍ puraEtA tE# astvathEmava# sya ( ) vara A pRuthivyA̍ ArE śatrU̱n kRuṇuhi sarvavIra̍ Edamaganma̍ dEvayajanaM̍ pRuthivyA viśvE# dEvA yadajuṣanta̍ pUrva# RuKsAmAByAM ~MyajuṣA̍ santarantO̍ rAyaspOṣEṇa̍ samiṣA madEma||8̍

verses.padam: iyam|tE|śukra|tanUḥ|idam|varcaḥ|tayA̱|samiti̍|Bava|BrAja̱m|gacCa|jUḥ|asi|dhRutA|mana̍sA|juṣṭA̱|viṣṇa̍vE|tasyA̱ḥ|tE|satyasa̍vasa̍ iti# satya - savasaḥ|prasavE iti# pra -savE|vAcaḥ|yantram|aśIya|svAhA̱|śukram|asi|amRuta̱m|asi|vaiśvadEvamiti# vaiśva -dEvam|haviḥ|sUryasya|cakṣu̍ḥ|Eti̍|aruham|agnEḥ|akṣṇaḥ|kanIni̍kAm|yat|Eta̍śEBiḥ|Iya̍sE|BrAja̍mAnaḥ|vipaścitA̱|cit|asi|manA|asi|dhIḥ|asi|dakṣi̍ṇA|9̍ (50)
verses.samhita: iyaM tE# śukra tanUridaM ~MvarcastayA saM Bava̍ BrAjaM̍ gacCa jUrasi̍ dhRutA manasA̍ juṣṭA viṣṇavE̍ tasyA̱stE satyasavasaḥ̍ prasavE vAcO yantramaśIya̍ svAhA# śukramasyamRuta̍masi̍ vaiśvadEvaṃ haviḥ sUryasya̍ cakṣurA -&ruhamagnE̍ rakṣṇaḥ kanInikAM̍ ~MyadEtaśEBirIya̍sE̍ BrAjamAnO̍ vipaścitA cidasi̍ manA&si dhIrasi̍ dakṣiṇA-[̍ ] 9

verses.padam: asi|yajñiyA̱|asi|kṣatriyA̱|asi|aditiḥ|asi|uBayata̍ḥ̍ śIrṣṇItyuBayata̍ḥ̍ - śIrṣṇI|sA|naḥ|suprAcIti su -prAcI|supratIcIti̍ su - pratIcI|samiti|Bava|mitraḥ|tvA|padi|baddhnAtu|pUṣA|addhva̍naḥ|pAtu|indrA̍ya|addhya̍kṣAyEtyadhi̍# - akṣAya|anviti|tvA|mAtA|manyatAm|anviti̍|pitA|anviti̍|BrAtA̱|saga̍rBya̍ iti sa - garByaḥ|anviti|saKA̱|sayU̍thya̍ iti sa - yUthyaḥ|sA|dEvi|dEvam|acCa|ihi|indrA̍ya|sOma̱m|rudraḥ|tvA|Eti̍|vartayatu|mitrasya̍|pathA|svasti|sOma̍saKEti̍ sOma# -saKA ( )|punaḥ|Eti̍|ihi|saha|rayyA||10̍ (55)
verses.samhita: &si yajñiyA&si̍ kṣatriyA &syaditi-rasyuBayata̍#śśIrṣṇI̍ sA naḥ suprAcI̍ supratIcI̍ saM Bava̍ mitrastvA# padi baddhnAtu̍ pUṣA&ddhvanaḥ̍ pAtvindrAyA-ddhyakṣAyAnu̍# tvA mAtA manyatAmanu̍# pitA&nu BrAtA sagarByO&nu saKA sayU̱thyaḥ sA dEvi̍ dEvamacCEhIndrAya̍ sOmaṃ# rudrastvA &&*vartayatu̍ mitrasya# pathA svasti sOmasaKA̍ ( ) punarEhi# saha rayyA||10

verses.padam: vasvI̱|asi|rudrA|asi|aditiḥ|asi|AdityA|asi|śukrA|asi|candrA|asi|bRuhaspati̍ḥ|tvA|sumnE|raṇvatu|rudraḥ|vasu̍Biriti̍ vasu# -Biḥ|Eti|cikEtu|pRuthivyAḥ|tvA|mUrddhann|Eti̍|jiGarmi|dEvayaja̍na̍ iti# dEva - yajanE|iḍA̍yAḥ|padE|GRutavatIti̍# GRuta - vati|svAhA̱|pariliKitamiti̍ pari# - liKitam|rakṣaḥ|pari̍liKitA̍ iti pari# - liKitAḥ|arAtayaḥ|idam|aham|rakṣa̍saḥ|grIvAḥ|apIti̍|kRuntAmi|yaḥ|asmAn|dvEṣṭi̍|yam|ca|vayam|dviṣmaḥ|idam|asya|grIvAḥ|11̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vasvyasi̍ rudrA&syaditi-rasyAdityA&si̍# śukrA&si# candrA&si bRuhaspatistvA̍ sumnE raṇvatu̍ rudrO vasuBirA̍ cikEtu̍ pRuthivyAstvA# mUrddhannA jiGarmi̍ dEvayajana̍ iḍAyAḥ̍ padE GRutavati̍ svAhA pariliKitaṃq̍ rakṣaḥ pariliKitA̍ arAtaya̍ idamahaṃ rakṣasO̍ grIvA api# kRuntAmi yO̱&smAn dvEṣṭi yaM ca# vayaM dviṣma idamasya̍ grIvA - [ ] 11

verses.padam: apIti|kRuntAmi|asmE̍ iti|rAya̍ḥ|tvE̍ iti|rAya̍ḥ|tOtE̱|rAya̍ḥ|samiti̍|dEvi|dEvyA|urvaśyA̱|paśyasva|tvaṣṭI̍matI|tE|sapEya|surEtA̍ iti# su - rEtA̱ḥ|rEtaḥ|dadhA̍nA|vIram|vidEya|tava̍|saMdRuśIti̍# saM - dRuśi|mA|aham|rAyaḥ|pOṣE̍ṇa|vIti̍|yOṣam||12̍ (29) (asya grIvA-EkAnna tri(gmq) śacca# ) (A5)
verses.samhita: api# kRuntAmyasmE rAyastvE rAyastOtE rAyaḥ saM dEvi̍ dEvyOrvaśyA# paśyasva tvaṣṭImatI̍ tE sapEya surEtA rEtO dadhAnA̍ vIraM ~MvidEya̍ tava# sandRuśi mA&haṃrAyaspOṣEṇa̍ vi yOṣaM||12̍

verses.padam: aṃqśunA̱|tE|aṃqśuḥ|pRucyatAm|paruṣA|paru̍ḥ|gandhaḥ|tE|kAma̱m|avatu|madA̍ya|rasa̍ḥ|acyu̍taḥ|amAtya̍ḥ|asi|śukraḥ|tE|graha̍ḥ|aBIti̍|tyam|dEvam|savitAra̱m|UṇyO̱ḥ|kavikra̍tumiti̍# kavi - kratum|arcAmi|satyasa̍vasamiti̍# satya -savasam|ratnadhAmiti# ratna - dhAm|aBIti|priyam|matim|UrddhvA|yasya̍|amati̍ḥ|BAḥ|adi̍dyutat|savI̍mani|hira̍ṇyapAṇiriti̍ hiraṇya̍ - pAṇiḥ|amimIta|sukraturiti# su - kratuḥ|kRupA|suva̍ḥ||prajABya̍ iti# pra - jAByaḥ|tvA|prAṇAyEti̍# pra - anAya|tvA|vyAnAyEti̍# vi -anAya|tvA|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|tvam|anu# ( )|prEti|anihi|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|tvAm|anu|prEti̍|anantu||13̍ (57)
verses.samhita: aṃqśunA# tE aṃqśuḥ pRucyatAM̍ paruṣA̍ parur̍ gandhastE kAmamavatu̍ madAya̍ rasO acyutO̍ &mAtyO&si̍ śukrastE grahO&Bi tyaM dEvaṃ savitAra̍mUṇyO̱ḥ̍ kavikratumarcA̍mi̍ satyasavasaṃ̍ ratnadhAmaBi priyama matimUrddhvA yasyAmatirBA adidyutath̍ savImani̍ hiraṇyapAṇiramimIta̍ sukratuḥ̍ kRupA suvaḥ|prajABya̍stvA̍ prAṇAya# tvA vyAnAya# tvA prajAstvamanu ( ) prAṇihi̍ prajAstvAmanu prAṇantu||13̍

verses.padam: sOma̱m|tE|krIṇAmi|Urjasvantam|paya̍svantam|vIryA̍vantamiti̍# vIrya# - vantam|aBimAtiṣAhamityaBimAti̍ - sAha̱m|śukram|tE|śukrEṇa|krIṇAmi|candram|candrEṇa̍|amRuta̱m|amRutE̍na|samyat|tE|gOḥ|asmE̍ iti|candrAṇi̍|tapa̍saḥ|tanUḥ|asi|prajApa̍tEriti̍# prajA - patEḥ|varṇaḥ|tasyA̱ḥ|tE|sahasrapOṣamiti̍# sahasra -pOṣam|puṣyantyAḥ|caramEṇa̍|paśunA̱|krIṇAmi|asmE̍ iti|tE|bandhu̍ḥ|mayi̍|tE|rAya̍ḥ|śrayantAm|asmE̍ iti|jyOti̍ḥ|sOmavikrayiṇIti̍# sOma - vikrayiṇi|tama̍ḥ|mitraḥ|naḥ|Eti̍|ihi|sumi̍tradhA̍ iti sumitra̍ - dhAḥ|indrasya|Urum̍ ( )|Eti|viśa|dakṣi̍ṇam|uśann|uśanta̱m|syOnaḥ|syOnam|svAna̍|BrAja̍|a~gGA̍rE|baMBA̍rE|hasta̍|suhastEti̍ su - hasta|kRuśAnaviti̍ kRuśa# - anO|EtE|vaḥ|sOmakrayaṇA̍ iti# sOma - krayaṇAḥ|tAn|rakṣaddhvam|mA|vaḥ|daBann||14̍ (72) (UruM-dvAviṃśatiśca)̍ (A7)
verses.samhita: sOmaM̍ tE krIṇAmyUrjasvantaM̍ payasvantaM̍ ~MvIryAvantamaBi-mAtiṣAhaṃ̍# śukraM tE# śukrEṇa# krIṇAmi candraM candrEṇAmRutamamRutE̍na̍ samyattE gOrasmE candrAṇi tapasastanUra̍si̍ prajApatEr̍ varṇastasyA̱stE sahasrapOṣaM puṣyantyAścaramEṇa̍# paśunA̱ krIṇAmyasmE tE bandhurmayi# tE rAyaḥ̍ śrayantAmasmE jyOtiḥ̍ sOmavikrayiṇi tamO# mitrO na Ehi sumitradhA̍ indrasyOru̍ ( ) mA viśa̍ dakṣiṇa-̍ muśannuśantaṅ# syOnaḥ syOnaṅ svAna BrAjA~gGArE̍ baMBArE̍ hasta suhasta̍ kRuśAnavEtE̍ vaḥ̍ sOma krayaṇAstAn̍ rakṣaddhvaM̍ mA vO# daBan||14 (uruM-dvAviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: uditi|Ayu̍ṣA|svAyuṣEti̍# su - AyuṣA̱|uditi|Oṣa̍dhInAm|rasE̍na|uditi̍|parjanya̍sya|śuṣmE̍ṇa|uditi̍|asthAm|amRutAn̍|anu̍||uru|antari̍kṣam|anviti̍|ihi|adi̍tyAḥ|sada̍ḥ|asi|adi̍tyAḥ|sada̍ḥ|Eti̍|sIda|asta̍BnAt|dyAm|RuṣaBaḥ|antari̍kṣam|ami̍mIta|varimAṇa̱m|pRuthivyAḥ|Eti̍|asIdat|viśvA̱|Buva̍nAni|saMrAḍiti̍ saM - rAṭ|viśvA̱|it|tAni|varu̍ṇasya|vratAni̍|vanE̍ṣu|vIti̍|antari̍kṣam|tatAna|vAja̱m|arvathsvityarva̍t̍ - su|payaḥ|aGniyAsu̍|hRuthsviti̍# hRut - su|15 (50)
verses.samhita: udAyuṣA̍ svAyuṣOdOṣadhInAṃq̍ rasEnOt parjanyasya̍ śuṣmEṇOdasthAmamRutAṃq̍ anu|urva̍ntari̍kṣamanvihyadi̍tyAḥ̍ sadO&syadityAḥ̍ sada A sIdAstaBnAd-dyAmRu̍ṣaBO̍ antarikṣamami̍mIta̍ varimAṇaM̍ pRuthivyA A&sIdad̍ viśvA BuvanAni̍ samrAḍ viśvEttAni varuṇasya̍ vratAni vanEṣu̍ vyantari̍kṣaM̍ tatAna vAjamarvathsu̍ payO# aGniyAsu# hRuthsu-[ ] 15

verses.padam: kratu̱m|varuṇaḥ|vikṣu|agnim|divi|sUrya̱m|adadhAt|sOma̱m|adrau̱|uditi̍|u|tyam|jAtavE̍dasamiti̍# jAta - vEdasam|dEvam|vahanti|kEtavaḥ||dRuśE|viśvA̍ya|sUrya̱m||usrau̱|Eti̍|itam|dhUṛqṣAhAviti̍# dhUḥ - sAhau|anaśrU iti|avI̍rahaṇAvityavI̍ra̍ - hanau|brahmacOdanAviti̍# brahma - cOdanau|varu̍ṇasya|skaMBa̍nam|asi|varu̍ṇasya|skaMBasarja̍namiti̍# skaMBa -sarjanam|asi|pratya̍sta̍ iti prati# - astaḥ|varuṇasya|pAśa̍ḥ||16̍ (35) ( hRuthsu-pa~jcatriṃśacca̍ ) (A8)
verses.samhita: kratuM ~MvaruṇO̍ vikṣvagniM̍ divi sUryamadadhAth̍ sOmamadrAvudutyaM jAtavEdasaM̍ dEvaM ~Mvahanti̍ kEtavaḥ|dRuśE̍ viśvAya̍ sUrya̱M||usrAvEtaM̍ dhUṛṣAhAvanaśrU avIrahaṇau̍ brahmacOdanau̍ varuṇasya̍ skaMBanamasi̍ varuṇasya̍ skaMBasarjanamasi̍ pratyastO̍ varuṇasya̍ pAśaḥ||16̍

verses.padam: prEti|cyavasva|Buvaḥ|patE|viśvA̍ni|aBIti̍|dhAmA̍ni|mA|tvA|pariparIti̍# pari - parI|vidat|mA|tvA|paripanthina iti# pari - panthinaḥ|vidann|mA|tvA|vRukA̱ḥ|aGAyava̍ ityaGa̍ - yavaḥ|mA|gandharvaḥ|viśvAva̍suriti̍# viśva - vasuḥ|Eti|daGat|śyEnaḥ|BUtvA|parEti̍|pata|yaja̍mAnasya|naḥ|gRuhE|dEvaiḥ|saṅqskRutam|yaja̍mAnasya|svastyayanIti̍# svasti - ayanI|asi|apIti̍|panthA̱m|agasmahi|svastigAmiti̍# svasti - gAm|anEhasa̱m|yEna|viśvA̱ḥ|parIti̍|dviṣa̍ḥ|vRuṇakti̍|vindatE̱|vasu̍|nama̍ḥ|mitrasya̍# ( )|varuṇasya|cakṣa̍sE|mahaḥ|dEvAya̍|tat|Rutam|saparyata|dUrEdRuśa̍ iti# dUrE - dRuśE̱|dEvajAtAyEti̍# dEva - jAtAya|kEtavE̱|divaḥ|putrAya|sUryA̍ya|śaṃqsata|varu̍ṇasya|skaMBa̍nam|asi|varu̍ṇasya|skaMBasarja̍namiti̍# skaMBa - sarjanam|asi|unmu̍kta̍ ityut - muktaḥ|varuṇasya|pAśa̍ḥ||17̍ (73) ( mitrasya-trayOviṃśatiśca̍ ) (A9)
verses.samhita: pra cyavasva̍ BuvaspatE viśvA̱nyaBi dhAmAni̍ mA tvA# pariparI vidanmA̍ tvA# paripanthinO# vidanmA tvA vRukA# aGAyavO mA gandharvO̍ viśvAvasurA̍ daGacCyEnO̍ BUtvA parA# pata yajamAnasya̍ nO gRuhE dEvaiḥ saṅskRutaM̍ ~MyajamAnasya̍ svastyayanyasyapi̍ panthAmagasmahi̍ svastigA-manEhasaM̍ ~MyEna viśvAḥ pari dviṣO# vRuṇakti# vindatE vasu namO# mitrasya ( ) varuṇasya̍ cakṣasE̍ mahO dEvAya tadRutaṃ saparyata̍ dUrEdRuśE# dEvajAtAya̍ kEtavE# divasputrAya sUryAya̍ śaṃsata varuṇasya̍ skaMBanamasi̍ varuṇasya̍ skaMBasarjana-masyunmu̍ktO̍ varuṇasya̍ pAśaḥ||17̍

verses.padam: agnEḥ|Atithyam|asi|viṣṇavE|tvA|sOma̍sya|Atithyam|asi|viṣṇa̍vE|tvA|ati̍thEḥ|Atithyam|asi|viṣṇa̍vE|tvA|agnayE̱|tvA|rAyaspOṣadAv^^nna̍ iti# rAyaspOṣa - dAv^^nnE̱|viṣṇavE|tvA|śyEnAya̍|tvA|sOmaBRuta̍ iti# sOma - BRutE̱|viṣṇavE|tvA|yA|tE|dhAmA̍ni|haviṣA̱|yaja̍nti|tA|tE|viśvA̱|pariBUriti̍# pari - BUḥ|astu|yajñam|gayasPAna iti# gaya - sPAnaḥ|pratara̍ṇa̍ iti# pra - taraṇaḥ|suvIra̍ iti# su - vIraḥ|avI̍rahEtyavI̍ra̍ - hA|prEti|cara̍ q|sOma|duryAn|adi̍tyAḥ|sada̍ḥ|asi|adi̍tyAḥ|sada̍ḥ|Eti̍|18̍ (50)
verses.samhita: agnE-rAtithyama̍si̍ viṣṇavE̍ tvA sOmasyA&&*tithyama̍si̍ viṣṇavE̍ tvA-&tithErAtithyama̍si̍ viṣṇavE̍ tvA&gnayE̱ tvA rAyaspOṣadAv.nnE viṣṇavE̍ tvA śyEnAya# tvA sOmaBRutE viṣṇavE̍ tvA yA tE dhAmAni̍ haviṣA yajanti̍ tA tE viśvA# pariBUrastu̍ yajñaM gayasPAna̍ḥ̍ prataraṇaḥ̍ suvIrO&vIrahA̍ pracarA̍ sOma duryAnadityAḥ̍ sadO&syadityAḥ̍ sada A-[ ] 18

verses.padam: sIda|varuṇaḥ|asi|dhRutavra̍ta̍ iti# dhRuta - vrataḥ|vAruṇam|asi|śaMyOriti# śaM - yOḥ|dEvAnA̱m|saKyAt|mA|dEvAnA̱m|apasaḥ|Cithsmahi|Apa̍taya̍ ityA - patayE|tvA|gRuhṇAmi|paripataya̍ iti pari# - patayE|tvA|gRuhṇAmi|tanUnaptra iti tanU̱ - naptrE̱|tvA|gRuhṇAmi|śAkvarAya|tvA|gRuhṇAmi|śakmann̍|Oji̍ṣṭhAya|tvA|gRuhṇAmi|anA̍dhRuṣṭamityanA̱̍ - dhRuṣṭam|asi|anAdhRuṣyamityanA̍ - dhRuṣyam|dEvAnA̱m|Ojaḥ|aBiśastipA̍ ityaBiśasti̍ - pAḥ|anaBiśastEnyamityanaBi̍ - śastEnyam|anviti|mE|dIkṣAm|dIkṣApa̍tiriti̍# dIkṣA - patiḥ|manyatAm|anviti|tapa̍ḥ|tapa̍spatiriti̍ tapaḥ̍ - patiḥ|a~jjasA|satyam|upEti̍|gEṣam|suvitE|mA̍ ( )|dhAḥ||19 (51)
verses.samhita: sIda̍ varuṇO&si̍ dhRutavratO̍ vAruṇamasi̍ śaM~MyOr dEvAnAṃ# saKyAnmA dEvAnA-mapasa̍-śCithsmahyApa̍tayE̍ tvA gRuhṇAmi paripatayE̍ tvA gRuhṇAmi tanUnaptrE̱ tvA gRuhṇAmi śAkvarAya# tvA gRuhṇAmi śakmannOjiṣṭhAya̍ tvA gRuhṇAmya-nAdhRuṣṭamasya-nAdhRuṣyaM̍ dEvAnAmOjO-̍ &BiṣastipA anaBiśastE&nyamanu̍# mE dIkṣAM dIkṣApatir̍ manyatAmanu tapastapaspatira~jja̍sA̍ satyamupa# gEṣaṃ suvitE mA# ( ) dhAḥ||19

verses.padam: aṃqśuraṃśurityaṃqśuḥ̍ - aṃqśuḥ|tE|dEva|sOma|Eti|pyAyatAm|indrA̍ya|Ekadhanavida̍ ityEkadhana̍ - vidE̱|Eti|tuBya̱m|indra̍ḥ|pyAyatAm|Eti̍|tvam|indrA̍ya|pyAyasva|Eti̍|pyAyaya|saKIn̍|sanyA|mEdhayA̱|svasti|tE|dEva|sOma|sutyAm|aśIya|Eṣṭa̍ḥ|rAya̍ḥ|prEti̍|iṣE|BagA̍ya|Rutam|RutavAdiBya̍ ityRutavAdi̍ - Byaḥ|namaḥ|divE|nama̍ḥ|pRuthivyai|agnE̱|vratapata̍ iti# vrata - patE|tvam|vratAnA̱m|vratapatiriti̍# vrata - patiḥ|asi|yA|mama|tanUḥ|EṣA|sA|tvayi̍|20̍ (50)
verses.samhita: aṃqśuraṃśustE̍ dEva sOmA&&*pyAyatA-mindrA̍yaikadhanavida̍ A tuByamindraḥ̍ pyAyatAmA tvamindrAya̍ pyAyasvA&&*pyAyaya̍ saKI̱nth sanyA mEdhayA̱ svasti tE# dEva sOma sutyAmaśIyEṣṭA̍ rAyaḥ prEṣE BagAyartamRu̍tavAdiByO̍ namO# divE namaḥ̍ pRuthivyA agnE̱ vratapatE tvaM ~MvratAnA̱M ~Mvratapatirasi̍ yA mama# tanUrEṣA sA tvayi -[ ] 20

verses.padam: yA|tava|tanUḥ|iyam|sA|mayi̍|saha|nau|vratapata̍ iti# vrata -patE|vratinO̱ḥ|vratAni|yA|tE|agnE|rudri̍yA|tanUḥ|tayA̱|naḥ|pAhi|tasyA̱ḥ|tE|svAhA̱|yA|tE|agnE|ayAśayEtya̍yA̍ - śayA|rajAśayEti# rajA - śayA|harAśayEti# harA - śayA|tanUḥ|vaṛṣiṣṭhA|gahvarEṣṭhEti̍# gahvarE - sthA|ugram|vacaḥ|apEti̍|avadhIm|tvEṣam|vaca̍ḥ|apEti̍|avadhIm|svAhA̱||21̍ (40) ( tvayi-catvAriṃqśacca̍# ) (A11)
verses.samhita: yA tava# tanUriyaṃ sA mayi# saha nau̱ vratapatE vratinO̱r vratAni yA tE# agnE rudriyA̍ tanUstayA# naḥ pAhi tasyA̱stE svAhA yA tE# agnE&yAśayA rajAśayA̍ harAśayA̍ tanUrvaṛṣiṣṭhA̍ gahvarEṣṭhO&graM ~MvacO apAvadhIM̍ tvEṣaM ~MvacO apAvadhIṅq̍ svAhA̱||21

verses.padam: vittAyanIti# vitta - ayanI|mE|asi|tiktAyanIti̍# tikta - ayanI|mE|asi|ava̍tAt|mA|nAthitam|ava̍tAt|mA|vyathitam|vidEḥ|agniḥ|naBa̍ḥ|nAma̍|agnE̱|a~ggiraḥ|yaḥ|asyAm|pRuthivyAm|asi̍|Ayu̍ṣA|nAmnA̱|Eti̍|ihi|yat|tE|anA̍dhRuṣṭamityanA̱̍ - dhRuṣṭam|nAma|yajñiya̱m|tEna̍|tvA|Eti̍|dadhE|agnE̱|a~ggiraḥ|yaḥ|dvitIya̍syAm|tRutIya̍syAm|pRuthivyAm|asi̍|Ayu̍ṣA|nAmnA̱|Eti̍|ihi|yat|tE|anA̍dhRuṣṭamityanA̱̍ - dhRuṣṭam|nAma|22̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vittAyanI̍ mE&si tiktAyanI̍ mE&syavatAnmA̍ nAthitamavatAnmA̍ vyathitaM ~MvidEragnirnaBO nAmAgnE# a~ggirO yO̱&syAM pRuthivyAmasyAyu̍ṣA̍ nAmnEhi yattE&nAdhRuṣṭaM̍ nAma# yajñiyaM tEna tvA&&*dadhE&gnE# a~ggirO yO dvitIyasyAM̍ tRutIyasyAM̍ pRuthivyA-masyAyuṣA̍ nAmnEhi yattE&nAdhRuṣṭaM̍ nAma-[̍ ] 22

verses.padam: yajñiya̱m|tEna|tvA|Eti̍|dadhE|siṃqhIḥ|asi|mahiṣIḥ|asi|uru|prathasva|uru|tE|yajñapa̍tiriti̍# yajña - patiḥ|prathatAm|dhruvA|asi|dEvEByaḥ|śundhasva|dEvEBya̍ḥ|śuMBasva|indraGOṣa̍ itI̱ndra - GOṣaḥ|tvA|vasuBiriti̍ vasu# - Biḥ|purastA̱t|pAtu|manOjavA̍ iti manaḥ̍ - javAḥ|tvA|pitRuBiriti# pitRu - Biḥ|dakṣiṇataḥ|pAtu|pracEtA̍ iti pra - cEtAḥ|tvA|rudraiḥ|paścAt|pAtu|viśvakarmEti# viśva - karmA|tvA|Adityaiḥ|uttarata ityut̍ - tarataḥ|pAtu|siṃqhIḥ|asi|sapatnasAhIti# sapatna - sAhI|svAhA̱|siṃqhIḥ|asi|suprajAvaniriti# suprajA - vaniḥ|svAhA̱|siṃqhIḥ|23̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yajñiyaM tEna tvA&&*dadhE̍ siṃqhIrasi̍ mahiṣIrasyuru̍ prathasvOru̍ tE# yajñapatiḥ̍ prathatAM dhruvA&si# dEvEByaḥ̍ śundhasva dEvEByaḥ̍ śuMBasvEndraGOṣastvA vasuBiḥ̍ purastA̱t pAtu manOjavAstvA̍ pitRuBir̍ dakṣiṇataḥ pAtu̍ pracEtAstvA̍ rudraiḥ paścAt pAtu̍ viśvakarmA̍ tvA&&dityairuttarataḥ̍ pAtu̍ siṃqhIrasi̍ sapatnasAhI svAhA# siṃqhIrasi̍ suprajAvaniḥ svAhA# siṃqhI-[ ] 23

verses.padam: asi|rAyaspOṣavaniriti# rAyaspOṣa - vaniḥ|svAhA̱|siṃqhIḥ|asi|AdityavanirityA̍ditya̍ - vaniḥ|svAhA̱|siṃqhIḥ|asi|Eti̍|vaha|dEvAn|dEvayata̍ iti# dEva - yatE|yajamAnAya|svAhA̱|BUtEBya̍ḥ|tvA|viśvAyuriti̍# viśva - Ayuḥ|asi|pRuthivIm|dRuṃqha|dhruvakṣiditi# dhruva - kṣit|asi|antarikṣam|dRuṃqha|acyutakṣiditya̍cyuta̍ -kṣit|asi|diva̱m|dRuṃqha|agnEḥ|Basma|asi|agnEḥ|purI̍ṣam|asi||24̍ (35) (nAma-suprajAvaniḥ̍ svAhA# simṃqhiḥ-pa~jcatriṃ̍ śacca ) (A12)
verses.samhita: rasi̍ rAyaspOṣavaniḥ svAhA# siṃqhIrasyAdityavaniḥ̍ svAhA# siṃqhIrasyA vaha̍ dEvAndEvayatE̍ yajamAnAya̍ svAhA# BUtEByastvA̍ viśvAyurasi̍ pRuthivIM dRuṃha̍ dhruvakṣidasyantari̍kṣaM̍ dRuṃhAcyutakṣidasi̍ divaM̍ dRuṃhAgnEr BasmA̱syagnEḥ purIṣamasi||24̍

verses.padam: yu~jjatE̱|manaḥ|uta|yu~jjatE|dhiya̍ḥ|viprA̱ḥ|vipra̍sya|bRuhataḥ|vipaścita̍ḥ||vIti̍|hOtrA̱ḥ|dadhE|vayunAviditi̍# vayuna - vit|Ekaḥ|it|mahI|dEvasya̍|savituḥ|pari̍ṣṭutiriti̍ pari# - stutiḥ||suvAgiti# su- vAk|dEva|duryAn|Eti̍|vada|dEvaśrutAviti̍# dEva - śrutau̱|dEvEṣu|Eti̍|GOṣEthAm|Eti̍|naḥ|vIraḥ|jAyatAm|karmaṇya̍ḥ|yam|sarvE̱|anujIvAmEtya̍nu̍ - jIvAma|yaḥ|bahUnAm|asa̍t|vaśI||idam|viṣṇu̍ḥ|vIti̍|cakramE|trEdhA|nIti̍|dadhE|padam||samU̍ḍhamiti̍ sam - Uḍham|asya|25 (50)
verses.samhita: yu~jjatE mana# uta yu~jjatE̍ dhiyO viprA viprasya̍ bRuhatO vipaścita̍ḥ|vi̍ hOtrA# dadhE vayunAvidEka inmahI dEvasya# savituḥ pariṣṭutiḥ||suvAgdE̍va̍ duryAṃq A vada̍ dEvaśrutau# dEvEṣvA GOṣEthAmA̍ nO# vIrO jAyatAM̍ karmaṇyO# yaṃ sarvE&nu̍ jIvAma̍ yO bahUnAmasa̍dvaśI||idaM̍ ~Mviṣṇur vicakramE̍ trEdhA ni dadhE̍ padaM||samUḍhamasya̍ - [ ] 25

verses.padam: pAṃqsurE|irAvatI̍ itIrA̱ - vatI|dhEnumatI iti# dhEnu - matI̱|hi|BUtam|sUyavasinI iti# su - yavasinI̱|manavE|yaśasyE̍# iti||vIti̍|askaBnAt|rOda̍sI̍ iti|viṣṇu̍ḥ|EtE̍ iti|dAdhAra̍|pRuthivIm|aBita̍ḥ|mayUKai̱ḥ||prAcI̍ iti|prEti̍|itam|addhvaram|kalpaya̍ntI̍ iti|Urddhvam|yajñam|nayatam|mA|jIhvaratam|atra̍|ramEthAm|vaṛṣmann̍|pRuthivyAḥ|divaḥ|vA|viṣṇO|uta|vA|pRuthivyAḥ|mahaḥ|vA|viṣṇO|uta|vA|antari̍kṣAt|hastau̱|pRuṇasva|bahuBiriti̍# bahu - Biḥ|vasavyai̱ḥ|A*|prEti|yacCa|26̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pAṃsuqra irAvatI̍ dhEnumatI hi BUtaṃ sUyavasinI̍ manavE̍ yaśasyE̱|vyaskaBnAd-rOda̍sI̍ viṣṇurEtE̍ dAdhAra# pRuthivImaBitO# mayUKai̱ḥ||prAcI prEtamaddhvaraM̍ kalpayantI̍ UrddhvaM ~MyajñaM nayataM̍ mA jI̱hvaratamatra# ramEthAM ~Mvarṣman̍ pRuthivyA divO vA# viṣṇavuta vA# pRuthivyA mahO vA# viṣṇavuta vA&ntarikṣAddhastau̍# pRuṇasva bahuBir̍ vasavyairA̍ pra yacCa̍ - [ ] 26

verses.padam: dakṣiṇAt|Eti̍|uta|savyAt||viṣṇO̱ḥ|nuka̱m|vIryA̍ṇi|prEti̍|vOcam|yaḥ|pArthi̍vAni|vimama̍ iti# vi - mamE|rajAṃsi|yaḥ|aska̍BAyat|utta̍ramityut̍ - taram|sadhasthamiti# sadha - stham|vicakramAṇa iti# vi - cakramAṇaḥ|trEdhA|urugAya ityuru̍ - gAyaḥ|viṣṇO̱ḥ|rarAṭa̱m|asi|viṣṇO̱ḥ|pRuṣṭham|asi|viṣṇO̱ḥ|śnaptrE iti|sthaḥ|viṣṇO̱ḥ|syUḥ|asi|viṣṇO̱ḥ|dhruvam|asi|vaiṣṇavam|asi|viṣṇa̍vE|tvA||27̍ (39) ( asya-yacCai - kAnna catvAriṃq̍ śacca# ) (A13)
verses.samhita: dakṣiṇAdOta̍ savyAt|viṣṇOrnukaM̍ ~MvIryAṇi̍ pra vOcaM̍ ~Myaḥ pArtthivAni̍ vimamE rajAṃsi̍ yO askaBAyadutta̍raṃ̍ sadhasthaM̍ ~MvicakramAṇa strEdhOrugAyO̍ viṣṇO# rarAṭamasi̍ viṣṇO̱ḥ pRuṣṭhamasi̍ viṣṇOḥ ś~japtrE̱ sthO viṣṇOḥ syUrasi̍ viṣṇO̱r dhruvamasi̍ vaiṣṇavamasi̍ viṣṇavE̍ tvA||27

verses.padam: kRuṇuṣva|pAjaḥ|prasi̍timiti̍ pra - sitim|na|pRuthvIm|yAhi|rAjA̱|iva|amavAnityama̍# - vAn|iBEna||tRuṣvIm|anviti̍|prasi̍timiti̍ pra - sitim|drUṇAnaḥ|astA̱|asi|viddhya|rakṣasa̍ḥ|tapi̍ṣṭhaiḥ||tava̍|BramAsa̍ḥ|AśuyA|patanti|anviti̍|spRuśa|dhRuṣatA|śOśu̍cAnaḥ||tapUṃ̍ṣi|agnE|juhvA̱|pata~ggAn|asa̍ndita̍ ityasa̱M - ditaḥ|vIti|sRuja|viṣva̍k|ulkAḥ||pratIti̍|spaśa̍ḥ|vIti̍|sRuja|tUrṇi̍tama̍ iti tUrṇi# - tamaḥ|Bava|pAyuḥ|viśaḥ|asyAḥ|ada̍bdaḥ||yaḥ|naḥ|dUrE|aGaśaṃ̍sa̍ ityaGa - śaṃqsaḥ|28 (50)
verses.samhita: kRuṇuṣva pAjaḥ prasitinna̍ pRuthvIM ~MyAhi rAjEvAmavAṃq̍ iBEna|tRuṣvImanu̍ prasitiM-drUṇAnO-&stA̍&si̍ viddhya# rakṣasa stapiṣṭhaiḥ||tava̍# BramAsa# AśuyA pantatyanu̍# spRuśa-dhRuṣatA śOśucAnaḥ|tapUṅ̍ṣyagnE̍ juhvA# pata~ggAnasanditO̍ visRuja̍ viṣvagulkAḥ||pratispaśO̍ visRuja-tUrṇi̍tamO̍ BavA# pAyurviśO asyA adabdhaḥ|yO̍ nO# dUrE aGaśaṃsO̍ - [ ] 28

verses.padam: yaḥ|anti|agnE̱|mAki̍ḥ|tE|vyathi̍ḥ|Eti̍|dadhaṛṣIt||uditi̍|agnE|tiṣṭha|praIti̍|Eti̍|tanuṣva|nIti̍|amitrAn̍|OṣatAt|tigmahEta̍ iti# tigma - hEtE||yaḥ|naḥ|arAtim|samidhAnEti̍# sam - idhAna|cakrE|nIcA|tam|dhakṣi|atasam|na|śuṣka̱m||Urddhvaḥ|Bava|pratIti|viddhya|adhIti̍|asmat|Aviḥ|kRuṇuṣva|daivyA̍nI|agnE||avEti̍|sthirA|tanuhi|yAtujUnA̱m|jAmim|ajA̍mim|prEti̍|mRuṇIhi|śatrUn̍||saḥ|tE|29̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yO antyagnE mAkiṣṭE̍ vyathirA dadhaṛṣIt||uda̍gnE̍ tiṣṭha pratyA *&&tanuṣva̍ nyamitrAṃ̍# OṣatAt tigmahEtE|yO nO arAtiṃ̍ samidhAna cakrE nIcA taM dhakṣyatasaM̍ na śuṣka̱M||UrddhvO Bava̍ pratividdhyA-&ddhyasmadAviṣkRu̍ṇuṣva̍ daivyA̱nyagnE|avasthirA̍ tanuhi̍ yAtujUnA̱M jAmimajAmiMq̍ pramRuṇIhi̍ śatrUn||sa̍ tE# - [ ] 29

verses.padam: jAnAti|sumatimiti# su - matim|yaviṣṭha|yaḥ|IvatE|brahma̍ṇE|gAtum|aira̍t||viśvA̍ni|asmai|sudinAnIti̍# su - dinAni|rAyaḥ|dyumnAni̍|aryaḥ|vIti̍|duraḥ̍|aBIti̍|dyaut||saḥ|it|agnE|astu|suBaga̍ iti# su - Bagaḥ|sudAnuriti̍# su - dAnuḥ|yaḥ|tvA|nityE̍na|haviṣA̱|yaḥ|ukthaiḥ||piprI̍ṣati|svE|Ayu̍ṣi|durOṇa̍ iti# duḥ - OnE|viśvA̱|it|asmai|sudinEti# su- dinA̱|sA|asat|iṣṭiḥ||arcA̍mi|tE|sumatimiti̍# su - matim|GOṣi|arvAk|samiti̍|tE|vAvAtA̱|jaratAM|30̍ (50)
verses.samhita: jAnAti sumatiM ~Myaviṣṭhaya̍ IvatE̍ brahmaṇE̍ gAtumairat|viśvA̱nyasmai̍ sudinAni̍ rAyO dyumnAnyaryO vidurO# aBi dyau̱t||sEdagnE̍ astu suBagaḥ̍ sudAnu-ryastvA nityEna̍ haviṣAya ukthaiḥ|piprIṣati̍ sva Ayuṣi̍ durOṇE viśvEdasmai̍ sudinA sA&sadiṣṭiḥ||arcA̍mi̍ tE sumatiM GOṣyarvAK-santE# vA vA tA# jaratA - [ ] 30

verses.padam: iyam|gIḥ||svaśvA iti# su - aśvA̱ḥ|tvA|surathA iti# su - rathA̱ḥ|marjayEma|asmE iti|kṣatrAṇi̍|dhArayEḥ|anviti̍|dyUn||iha|tvA|BUri̍|Eti̍|carEt|upEti̍|t^mann|dOṣA̍vastariti̍ dOṣA̱ - vastaḥ|dIdivAṃsa̱m|anviti|dyUn||krIḍa̍ntaḥ|tvA|sumana̍sa̍ iti# su - manasaḥ|sapEma|aBIti̍|dyumnA|tasthivAṃsa̍ḥ|janA̍nAm||yaḥ|tvA|svaśva̍ iti# su - aśvaḥ|suhiraṇya̍ iti# su - hiraṇyaḥ|agnE|upayAtItyupa̍ - yAti|vasu̍matEti̍ vasu# - matA|rathEna||tasya̍|trAtA|Bavasi|tasya̍|saKA̱|yaḥ|tE|Atithyam|Anuṣak|jujO̍ṣat||mahaḥ|rujAmi|31̍ (50)
verses.samhita: miyaMgIḥ|svaśvA̱stvA surathA# marjayEmAsmE kṣatrAṇi# dhArayEranu dyUn||iha tvA BUryA carE̍ dupatman dOṣAvastar̍ dIdivAṃsamanu dyUn|krIḍantastvA̍ sumanasaḥ̍ sapEmABi dyumnA tasthivAṃsO̍ janAnAM||yastvA-svaśva̍ḥ̍ suhiraṇyO agna̍ upayAti vasumatA̍ rathEna|tasya̍# trAtA-Bavasi̍ tasya saKA yasta# AtithyamAnuṣag̍ jujOṣat||mahO̍ rujAmi̍ - [ ] 31

verses.padam: bandhutA̱|vacOBiriti̍ vacaḥ̍ - Biḥ|tat|mA|pituḥ|gOtamAt|anviti̍|iyAya||tvam|naḥ|asya|vaca̍saḥ|cikiddhi|hOta̍ḥ|yaviṣṭha|sukratO̍ iti# su - kratO|damUnAḥ||asva̍pnaja̍ ityasvapna̍ - jaḥ|taraṇayaḥ|suśEvA̍ iti# su-śEvA̱ḥ|atandrAsaḥ|avRukAḥ|aśra̍miṣṭhAḥ||tE|pAyava̍ḥ|saddhriya̍~jcaḥ|niṣadyEti̍# ni - sadya|agnE̱|tava̍|naḥ|pAntu|amUra||yE|pAyava̍ḥ|mAmatEyam|tE|agnE|paśya̍ntaḥ|andham|duritAditi̍# duḥ - itAt|arakṣann||rarakṣa̍|tAn|sukRuta̍ iti# su - kRutaḥ|viśvavE̍dA̍ iti# viśva - vEdAḥ|diPsantaḥ|it|ripava̍ḥ|na|ha|32̍ (50)
verses.samhita: bandhutA vacOBistanmA̍# piturgOtamAda-nvi̍yAya|tvannO̍# asya vacasa-ścikiddhi̍ hOtaryaviṣṭha̍ sukratO damUnAḥ||asva̍pnaja̍ staraṇayaḥ̍ suśEvA atandrAsO&vRukA̍ aśramiṣṭhAḥ|tE̍ pAyavaḥ̍ saddhriya~jcO̍ niṣadyA&gnE tavanaḥ̍ pAntvamUra||yE pAyavO# mAmatEyaM tE# agnE paśyantO̍ andhaM duritAdara̍kṣan|rarakṣatAnth̍ sukRutO# viśvavEdA̍ diPsanta̍ idripavO nA ha# - [ ] 32

verses.padam: dEBuḥ||tvayA̱|vayam|sadhanya# iti# sadha - nyaḥ|tvOtA̱ḥ|tava̍|praṇItIti̍ pra - nItI|aśyAma|vAjAn||uBA|śaṃsA̱|sUdaya|satyatAta̍ iti# satya - tAtE|anuṣṭhuyA|kRuṇuhi|ahrayAṇa||ayA|tE|agnE|samidhEti# saM - idhA̱|vidhEma|pratIti|stOma̱m|śasyamA̍nam|gRuBAya||daha̍|aśasa̍ḥ|rakṣasa̍ḥ|pAhi|asmAn|druhaḥ|nidaḥ|mitramaha̍ iti# mitra - mahaḥ|avadyAt||rakṣOhaṇamiti# rakṣaḥ - hana̱m|vAjina̱m|Eti|jiGarmi|mitram|prathi̍ṣṭham|upEti̍|yAmi|śarma̍||śiśA̍naḥ|agniḥ|kratu̍Biriti̍ kratu# - Biḥ|samiddha̍ iti saM - iddhaḥ|saḥ|naḥ|divA̱|33 (50)
verses.samhita: dEBuḥ||tvayA# vayaṃ sadhanya̍-stvOtA-stava̍ praṇI̱tyaśyAma vAjAn|uBA̍ śaṃsA# sUdaya satyatAtE-&nuṣṭhuyA kRuṇuhyahrayAṇa||ayA̍ tE# agnE samidhA# vidhEma pratistOmaṃ# śasyamAnaM̍ gRuBAya|dahAśasO# rakṣasaḥ̍ pAhyasmAn̍ druhO nidO mitramahO̍ avadyAt||rakṣOhaṇaM# ~MvAjinamAjiGarmi̍ mitraM prathiṣṭha-mupa̍yAmi̍ śarma|śiśA̍nO̍ agniḥ kratuBiḥ̍ samiddhaḥsanO̍ divA - [ ] 33

verses.padam: saḥ|riṣaḥ|pAtu|nakta̱m||vIti|jyOti̍ṣA|bRuhatA|BAti|agniḥ|Aviḥ|viśvA̍ni|kRuṇutE|mahitvEti̍# mahi - tvA||prEti|adE̍vIḥ|mAyAḥ|sahatE|durEvA̍ iti# duḥ - EvA̱ḥ|śiśItE|śRu~ggE̍ iti|rakṣa̍sE|vinikṣa̍ iti# vi - nikṣE̱||uta|svAnAsaḥ|divi|santu|agnEḥ|tigmAyu̍dhA̍ iti# tigma - AyudhAḥ|rakṣasE|hantavai|u||madE̱|cit|asya|prEti̍|rujanti|BAmA̱ḥ|na|varantE|paribAdha̍ iti# pari - bAdhaḥ|adE̍vIḥ||34̍ (41) (aGaśa(gm)saḥ-sa̍ tE-jaratAṃ̍ rujAmi-ha divai-kacatvAriṃśacca)|(A14)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAm pada pAṭhE prathamakAṇḍE dvitIyaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||----------------------------------------------------------------
verses.samhita: sariṣaḥ pAtunakta̱M||vijyOti̍ṣA̍ bRuhatA BA̱tyagni-rAvir viśvAni̍ kRuṇutE mahitvA|prAdEvIr̍ mAyAḥ sahatE-durEvAḥ̍ śiśItE̍ śRu~ggE rakṣasE̍ vinikṣE̱||uta svAnAsO# diviṣantvagnE̍ stigmAyudhA̍ rakṣasE̍ hantavA u|madE̍# cidasya prarujanti̍ BAmA na varantE̍ paribAdhO adEvIḥ||34̍ (aGaśaṃsaḥ-sa̍ tE-jaratAṃ-rujAmi-ha̍ -divai - kacatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A14) praśna korvai with starting padams of 1 to 14 anuvAkams :- (Apa# undantvA-kU̱tyai-daivI-miyantE-vasvya̍sya-ṃqśunA̍tE-sOma̍nta-udAyu̍ṣA̍ pra cyavasvA-̍ gnErAtithya̍ -maṃqśuraṃ# śur-vittAyanI̍ mE&si -yu~jcatE-kRuṇuṣva̍ pAja-ścaturdaśa|)̍ korvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (ApO-vasvyasi̍ yA tavE-ya~ggI-ścatustriṃśat|)̍ first and last padam of second praśnam :- (Apa# undan-tvadEvIḥ|)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM prathamakAṇḍE dvitIyaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- OM namaḥ paramAtmanE, śrI mahAgaṇapatayE namaḥ, śrI guruByO namaḥ|hariḥ OM||1.3 prathamakAṇḍE tRutIyaḥ praśnaḥ -
